## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and cache

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
bin/
obj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Dd]ebug/
[Rr]elease/
x64/
x86/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]64/
bld/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/

# Visual Studio files
.vs/
.vscode/

# NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
*.nuget.props
*.nuget.targets

# Others
*.dbmdl
*.jfm
*.pdb
*.cache
*.log
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
TestResult*/
[Tt]est[Rr]esult*/
*.tlog
*.ide/

# Backup & generated files
*.bak
*.tmp
*.temp
*.svclog
*.pidb
*.scc
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper
